title: Vasundhara Kundan & Pearl Choker - A Royal Statement
materials: and Cultured Pearls. The kundan stones are carefully selected for their clarity and brilliance. The Pearls are South Sea pearls.
features: This exquisite choker features a traditional Kundan setting, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The intricate floral design is adorned with vibrant Rubies and sparkling Kundan stones, creating a regal look. Emerald drops add a touch of elegance. The pearl strings are woven to provide strength and comfort. The piece showcases the famed Hyderabadi craftsmanship and attention to detail.
colors: and Pearl White. The classic color combination adds a timeless charm
occasions: and other special occasions. Suitable for traditional ceremonies like Seemantham (baby shower) and half-saree functions (Vayyarala Voobata). Can also be paired with modern outfits for a fusion look.
description: This Vasundhara Choker is a testament to South Indian heritage and skilled craftsmanship. Its regal design, combined with the brilliance of Kundan stones and the allure of natural gemstones, makes it a valuable heirloom piece. The use of high-quality materials ensures its durability and lasting beauty. A true statement of grace and elegance.
